Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the amount of money spent on dealing with sea-level rise in the Miami area and protecting coral reefs.
Understate: The claim may understate the actual amount of money spent on these projects.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the stated figures.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that spending money on projects like upgrading sewer systems and improving water quality will effectively address sea-level rise.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the projects and funding mentioned, such as their focus on beach maintenance and flood mitigation rather than directly combating sea-level rise.
